name: Far Far Away From Here
description:
Very far away - Once upon a time in the same kingdom there lived a king .. No, he did not sit all his life on his throne, he was very fond of adventure and danger. Take over the reins of the rebellious king and show the goblins who's in charge! Collect coins stolen by enemies and dodge their well-aimed shots in this adventure server and restore order in your kingdom


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
